name: Hallways (GuyMakesStuff)
description:
Progress Through A Random Procedurally Generated Hallway, Collecting Coins Along The Way To Earn As Much Score As You Can In The Given Time Limit!

There Is Also An "Explorer Mode" If You Just Want To look Around The Hallway Without Collecting Coins And No Time Limit, Seeing What Kind Of Interesting Things The Random Generation Will Give You And Finding Interesting Seeds.

This Project Is Less Of A game And More Of An Experiment Of Me Playing Around With Procedural Hallway Generation (E.G The Backrooms) In Fact, It Is Part Of A Large Personal Unity Project Where I Play Around With Things That Interest Me (Like Terrain Generation, Fractals, And More), So This Is Just For Fun :)

Textures From Google Images.

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Hallways-Source
